datafield.subfield: The single top quark production has an electroweak nature and provides an additional to the top pair production source of the top quarks. The processes involving single top have unique properties, they are very interesting from both theoretical and experimental view points. Short review of the single top quark production processes is given in the paper.
Invited Review for International Journal of Modern Physics A. 20 pages, 14 figures, 4 tables
International Journal of Modern Physics A27 (2012) 1230026
00012 Cross sections for the top quark production in various processes as a function of linear collider energies
00014 The representative leading order Feynman diagrams for FCNC gluon coupling between a charm quark and a top quark (for a u-quark the diagrams are the same).
00000 The representative diagrams for the single top production at the Tevatron and LHC colliders
00013 Angular distribution for the angle between the electron beam and muon from the top decay in single-antitop-quark production at $\gamma e^-$ 500 GeV collider.

00004 Distributions of the transverse momentum and pseudorapidity for the lepton and neutrino from the decay of the top quark in the effective NLO approximation (simulated by the SingleTop generator) and in the exact NLO approximation (calculated by the MCFM code) for the Tevatron collider.

00005 Distribution in the cosine of the angle between the momenta of the light quark and lepton from the decay of the top quark in its rest frame. This variable is the best to observe spin correlations in the $t$--channel process. The solid and dotted histograms correspond to the NLO and LO events, respectively.

00002 Distributions after the combination of $2\to 2$ events for the $pp\to tq+b_{ISR}$ (ISR is simulated by the PYTHIA generator) and $2\to 3$ events of $pp\to tq+b_{LO}$ (calculated using the CompHEP package) processes at the LHC collider with the matching parameter $P_T^0(b)=10$ GeV.

00003 Distributions of the final quarks in the transverse momentum and pseudorapidity in the effective NLO approximation (simulated by the SingleTop generator) and in the exact NLO approximation (obtained by the ZTOP code) for the Tevatron collider.
00001 The representative NLO diagrams for the $t$--channel single top production at the Tevatron and LHC colliders
00006 The representative LO and NLO diagrams for the $tW$--channel single top production at the Tevatron and LHC colliders
